Class MouseClick

  • java.lang.Object
    • gui.inputHandlers.clicks.MouseClick
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    DoubleClick, Drag, SingleClick

    public class MouseClick
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that represents a mouse click

        public void translate(int x,
                      int y)
        Translates a mouseclick so that the given x and y is the new origin.
        Parameters:

        y - The y value to make the new origin.
